Package net.sf.debianmaven.utils

Class FilterUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.debianmaven.utils.FilterUtils
  • public class FilterUtils
extends Object
    For filtering resources, replacing variables with actual values obtained from the model.
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)

                                               String line)
        Extracts variables from a line: ${blah} -> blah.
        Parameters:
        log - for logging
        line - the line to process
        Returns:
        the variables found

      • variableValue

        protected static String variableValue​(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                                      String var,
                                      org.apache.maven.model.Model model)
        Obtains the variable value from the model ("project.*").
        Parameters:
        log - for logging
        var - the variable
        model - the model to obtain the value from
        Returns:
        null if not found or not a string object, otherwise the value

      • filterFile

        public static void filterFile​(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                              Path input,
                              Path output,
                              org.apache.maven.model.Model model,
                              Map<String,String> additional)
                       throws IOException
        Filters a file, replacing any project or additional variables in it.
        Parameters:
        log - for logging
        input - the input file
        output - the output file
        model - the model to use for resolving "project.*" variables
        additional - additional variables with associated values
        Throws:
        IOException - if reading/writing of file fails
